_meta.source: Researched from National Park Service, cruise line guides, and Alaska tourism

bbox_hint.note: Covers Glacier Bay National Park - scenic cruising, no docking

transit_routes.name: Scenic Cruising Day
transit_routes.note: Ships enter at Bartlett Cove (rangers board), cruise to glaciers, return. No shore landing.

featured_experiences.name: Margerie Glacier Viewing
featured_experiences.note: Ships position close to glacier. Watch for ice calving - spectacular and unpredictable.

featured_experiences.name: Wildlife Spotting
featured_experiences.note: Bring binoculars. Rangers provide narration. Brown bears sometimes visible on beaches.

featured_experiences.name: Ranger Programs
featured_experiences.note: National Park rangers board at Bartlett Cove and provide narration during entire visit.
